creator: b.coret@gmail.com
text:
It would be nice if you could define sets of patterns to include or exclude 
within the HTTP Proxy Server. Now you keep 
adding .*\.js .*\.gif .*\.jpg .*\.css .*\.png every time you want to record a 
new script without the static content. If you could define presets of define 
sets in a property file the HTTP Proxy Server would be easier to use.
